Name: IIS Website - Create
Description: Creates a new website in IIS

Parameters.Name: WebsiteName
Parameters.Label: Website name
Parameters.HelpText:
The display name of the IIS website to create.

Example: Default Web Site

Parameters.Name: WebRoot
Parameters.Label: Relative home directory
Parameters.HelpText:
The directory which will be used as the home directory of the IIS website. This should be bound to the installation directory of a previous step.

Example: C:\inetpub\wwwroot

Parameters.Name: ApplicationPoolName
Parameters.Label: Application pool name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the application pool in IIS to use for the new website

Parameters.Name: BindingProtocol
Parameters.Label: Protocol
Parameters.HelpText: The protocol to use for the new website

Parameters.Name: BindingPort
Parameters.Label: Port
Parameters.HelpText: The port to use for the new website

Parameters.Name: BindingIpAddress
Parameters.Label: IP address
Parameters.HelpText: The IP address to use for the new website

Parameters.Name: BindingHost
Parameters.Label: Host
Parameters.HelpText:
The host name to use for the new website

Example: company.example.com

Parameters.Name: BindingSslThumbprint
Parameters.Label: Thumbprint
Parameters.HelpText:
The thumbprint of the SSL certificate to use for the new website when using the HTTPS protocol

Example: 7c003ac253aa41e89976f139c11edd7b

Parameters.Name: IisAuthentication
Parameters.Label: IIS Authentication
Parameters.HelpText: The authentication mode to use for the new website (can be Anonymous, Basic or Windows)
